titles.title: A bill to prohibit the implementation of a policy change to permit small, non-locking knives on passenger aircraft.
A bill to prohibit the implementation of a policy change to permit small, non-locking knives on passenger aircraft.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Commerce, Science, and Transportation.

bill.summary: This bill prohibits the Department of Homeland Security from implementing any change to the prohibited items list of the Transportation Security Administration that would permit passengers to carry small, non-locking knives through passenger screening checkpoints at airports, into sterile areas at airports, or onboard passenger aircraft.
